application_type_full: Full planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Demolition of the practice bay and pro shop. Erection of a Storage and Simulator Pavilion

open_spaces_details.description: The proposal does not affect the green open space at all but there is a small paved opening between the current practice bay and proshop which allows views through to the golf course. The proposal has maintained a gap here to keep views and openness through the new building, under the connecting roof. This alteration of open land has been addressed extensively with planning officers at pre-app meeting and agreed that an extended gap of 4m should be sufficient to not damage the sense of openness too significantly.
open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Outdoor sports facilities incl. school playing fields
